snippet.title: The Lost Brewery | Release Trailer | Indie game | Unity3D
snippet.description:
The Lost Brewery is an indie game about dwarves which takes pace in a fantasy setting. It will comprise a non-linear scenario and rpg games elements. The gameplay slightly reminds "Digger" and "The Legend of Zelda" (1986). The game is ready, English localization is the only thing left. It will be released after New Year. 

The game will be released in Russian and English. Other languages may be added after the first release.

The game has been developed using Unity 3D game engine.

Twitter:
https://twitter.com/RogVevepla

Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/groups/thelostbrewery/


My live stream where I perform a level design sometimes:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCVQs3JEyMHoo4QTUQLAeBug
or
https://www.twitch.tv/rogveveplalive

Music by Pavel Gorev
